execution_plan.description: Get per-user post counts and usernames from the app database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT u.id AS app_user_id, u.username AS username, COUNT(p.id) AS posts_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN posts p ON p.user_id = u.id GROUP BY u.id, u.username;

execution_plan.description: Get per-user chat membership counts (number of distinct chats) and message counts with usernames from the app_chat database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT u.id AS chat_user_id, u.username AS username, COUNT(DISTINCT cm.chat_id) AS chats_count, COUNT(m.id) AS messages_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN chat_members cm ON cm.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN messages m ON m.sended_by = u.id GROUP BY u.id, u.username;
